body:
Thanks for everything.

I enjoyed my time playing on this network. Thanks for the tournaments, Apollo. Thanks to all of you that have been nice to me. Sorry to all the people I've been a dick to. Enjoy life.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GTVD_203NMM
